NativeTransferEventsExample.name: Native XLM Transfer Events
NativeTransferEventsExample.description: Example request to the `getEvents` method, filtering for `transfer` events for native Lumens and limiting the number of returned events to 2.

WildcardTransferEventsExample.name: Native XLM Transfer Events
WildcardTransferEventsExample.description: Example request to the `getEvents` method, filtering for ALL `transfer`-like events and limiting the number of returned events to 2.

AnyEventsExample.name: All Events
AnyEventsExample.description: Example request to the `getEvents` method, filtering for all events of all types for any and all contracts.
